statements.select: SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherMaterial WHERE ((ProduceOtherMaterialDate>=#startdate# OR #startdate# IS NULL) AND (ProduceOtherMaterialDate<=#enddate# OR #enddate# IS NULL)) AND (SupplierId IN (SELECT SupplierId FROM Supplier WHERE (Id>=#sid1# OR #sid1# IS NULL) AND (Id<=#sid2# OR #sid2# IS NULL)) OR SupplierId IS NULL) AND ((ProduceOtherCompactId>=#cid1# OR #cid1# IS NULL) AND (ProduceOtherCompactId<=#cid2# OR #cid2# IS NULL))
select * from ProduceOtherMaterial where DepotOutState<>2 or DepotOutState is null
